alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tulare County through 630 PM PST... At 559 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Strathmore, or 8 miles north of Porterville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Porterville, Lindsay, Strathmore, East Porterville and Springville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Foothills; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
